title: Businessweek Extra- Wondery COO Jen Sargent
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra- Wondery COO Jen Sargent
description:
Featuring a conversation with Jen Sargent, Chief Operating Officer at Wondery. She discusses why podcasts have taken off during the pandemic and Wondery's sports programming.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
